review: I would like to say that I feel like the $35 was well spent but that would be lying. Something i really cant do because i failed salesperson/marketing training.  This device, while it does offer the ability to stream from my laptop or an android device, is limited in what it has loaded on it.  I was hoping it would come with its own browser but I guess browser software is so bloated anymore it wont fit on something like this.  Also you really can't use this without it being plugged into power. What the heck is the purpose of that? Why can't it get power from HDMI? I was sadly disappointed and feel like the $35 i spent could have been better spent on something else like a couple of good wines or some good beer or maybe even a dinner.
